availability.p: Preferred citation: Digital version of Dzukian Prayers (draft version). 2025-03-10. By: Jolanta Gelumbeckaitė, Jost Gippert, Florian Matter. In: Carling, Gerd & Jost Gippert (2025). TITUS 2.0. Frankfurt: Goethe University.

div.p:
Teve mvſu kuriſ eſi /aſi/ dangwaſu ſʒvijſkiſi vardaſ tava /tavo/
athaijki tava karaliſtija buki thava vala kaijp dvn=
gvij theijp ſʒamijaij . dvanv mvſu viſu dʒenv dvaki
mvmvſ nv ijr athlaijſki mvmvſ mvſu kaltheſ
kaijp ijr meſ athlyaijdʒame mvſu kalcʒijemvſ
nijevijaſki mvſu ſʒalanv ale mvſ gijalbijak nvagi
viſa piktha amen.

Swijeijka maria mijlyſtaſ pijlna dʒevaſ ſvthavimij
pagirtha thv tharpu matherv ijr pagirthaſ
gimiſ ſʒijvatha thava ijeſus crus

Cʒijkijv ijngi dʒewa thijawa viſagalincʒi darijthaijv
dangawſ ir ſʒamijaſ, ir ingi
yeſu kriſtu ſvnv ija vijenathuri panv mvſu kurijſ
praſidijaijſ eſcʒi ſʒwenthv dwaſijv, gimiſ ijſgi mariaſ
mergaſ, kinthiſ pa panſkvaijv pilatv, yſʒpijalataſ [vſʒcʒijeſthaſ]
alba vſʒmuſʒthaſ anth krijſʒawſ, nvmiriſ ijr pakaſthaſ
nvſʒijngi peklvaſnv trijacʒv dʒenv kijalijſi ijſʒgi nv=
mirvſijv, vſʒſʒijngi dangvaſnv [anta dvngv] ſȧdʒij antha deſʒijnijaſ
dʒewa thijava viſagalincʒa, nvagi thi athaijſ
ſvdʒijthv giwa ijr nvmiruſijv . cʒijkijv yngi dvaſijv
ſʒwenthv, ſʒwenthv baſʒnijcʒv krijkſʒcʒanijv - ſʒwen=
thvijv drawgiſti, athleijdʒijmv grechv, kvnv ijſgi
nvmirvſyv kyalijmv, pa ſmercʒi amſʒijv ſʒijvathv
ter dicitur
dʒeve bvki mijlaſʒijrdaſ mani greſʒnamv ame[n]
